lines.text: CRAWL GOES HERE.
do we have to do the intro every time?
If you ask me to run a Beast Dungeon session for you, I'll run the entire session!
this 'mighty hero' wants to fight some ghosts.
I'll put a really wet and pathetic one on the ground floor, just for you. <3
CRAWL GOES HERE.
Hannah?
yep.
Am I hearing video game sounds right now?
yep. playing DigiBubble Beat DX while you exposit.
The nerve!! Here, let me pull up a Household Man Funny Moments vid to keep your attention. >:P
... Actually, wait. That's the musical bubble one, right?
... Does it have free-play? :3c
yea? uh oh, you're planning something.
Okay, hear me out: we can still run the Highclaw Plains one shot, but we ditch the combat system...
...and instead, we run every fight as a DigiBubble match? I can set up the levels.
woah. okay. you think you're up to it?
Oh yeah, this'll be a lovely change of pace for moi.
I'm thinking we title it...... BEAST DUNGEON RELOADED: Beat Bubble Deluxe!
wordy.
Musical Monsters of Mine.
trademark infringing.
Hm... How about:
